lines.text:
[to the elders]
I am not guilty. The cause of Maggie's death... was fear. Fear of her brutal husband. Yes, fear is your weapon, and it's a dangerous weapon because one day it will recoil on your heads.

[to Mack]
I do not count my chickens before I see them, and then I wait until the eggs are hatched out.
This was going to e a peaceful mission!
Indeed, it was. Unfortunately, human nature is apt to determine where peace ends and strife begins.
If I kill, it is to achieve a purpose, not for the sake of killing.

[Realizes the sword thrust through him is fatal]
Oh, Mama...
